name: Police Car City Driving
description:
Police Car City Driving is an amazing police car driving simulator. Taking the role of the police, you drive around the city in a fast police car racing around the city as you want, crash into other cars, jumping from huge ramps, scale buildings, do stunts and destroy yourself and other vehicles. You're free to do whatever you want in this fun and amazing police car driving simulation!

Features:
- Realistic car driving game physics
- Intelligent city A.I traffic driving
- Multiple dynamic HD camera angles
- Easy to play car driving controls
